name: Ccrypt Encrypted File
summary: Learn about .SUF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Ccrypt files use the .CPT file extension by default. The ".suf" extension is used if the user types "ccrypt -S" when encrypting a file.

description: File encrypted with ccrypt, an open-source encryption utility; uses an asymmetric encryption algorithm based on the Rijndael cipher; requires a password to open.
